howItWorks.title: Farmers connect capacity + compute
howItWorks.excerpt: All you need is an electricity source, a network, and a 3Node (server). Connect from home or from the office, connect one node or build a small data center.

howItWorks.title: Get rewarded with tokens
howItWorks.excerpt: By connecting your 3Node and providing capacity, you generate ThreeFold Tokens (TFT). This is called farming.

howItWorks.title: Users reserve capacity
howItWorks.excerpt: When users reserve that capacity, they pay you in TFT. This is called cultivation.

howItWorksMain.title: Largest p2p Internet Grid is Live

features.excerpt: The offer includes paper in wide range of density and sizes. Ideal for high-quality printing and photocopying.

cta.title: No paper plane can be made without paper
cta.excerpt: Professional, dedicated, local. Dunder Mifflin is on its best patch to change the way you think about paper. That’s us - people who sell limitless paper in the paperless world.
